messages.subject: Reading Late/Dyslexia
messages.msgSnippet: Here s a link to Educational Heretics Press and Pages from the Roland Meighan column in Natural Parent magazine about Dyslexia and the obsession with literacy.
messages.messageBody:
Here's a link to Educational Heretics Press and Pages
from the Roland Meighan column in Natural Parent
magazine about Dyslexia and the obsession with
literacy.


http://www.gn.apc.org/edheretics/EHT002.htm

thought it was intersting. Not sure if I agreed with
everything. I liked most the first part how the
parents supported the kids and that all the kids
learned to read.

Samantha
"accentuate the positive ignore the negative"
Samantha
